name: Knuckles Cakewalk 3D
description:
The story so far:

Once upon the time knuckles was set on a mission to find where did his beloved master emerald come from. But *Oh, no* he was trapped inside of an ancient pyramid. Play as ya boy knuckles to find his evil twin knuckles, to resolve an ancient mystery of having a nap in an unknown environment. Can he escape? Will he survive? Only you decide.

Source code available at:  https://github.com/VladDoc/YetAnotherRayCaster

Controls:

WASD - walk and strafe

LShift - run

C - center view

Left mouse button - destroy a wall

Right mouse button - create a wall nearby

F2, F3 - change resolution

F4 - toggle fullscreen

F12 - toggle texture gradient mode(slow!)

Page Up - change sky color

Page Down - toggle on/off  floor
